decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s):

01 REV:260723 (Approved Ground Floor); 02 REV:260723 (Approved First Floor); 03  REV:260723(Approved and Proposed Loft plan); 04  REV:260723(Approved and Proposed Roof Plan); 05 REV:260723(Proposed Loft Plan); 06  REV:260723(Approved and Proposed Front Elevation); 07 REV:260723 (Approved and Proposed Rear Elevation); 08 REV:260723 (Approved and Proposed Side Elevation); 09 REV:260723 (Approved and Proposed Section AA); BP01 REV:260723 (Proposed Block Plan); Site Location plan (drawings revised; dated July 2023)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 232266HH dated 31/07/2023 for: Rear roof extension (following demolition of existing roof extension). Amendment seeks replacement of second floor approved windows with Juliette balconies.
